messages.body:
$BB We're building a dystopia just to make people click on ads | Zeynep Tufekci

https://youtu.be/iFTWM7HV2UI
I urge everyone to watch this video $FB $AAPL

links.title: We're building a dystopia just to make people click on ads | Zeynep Tufekci
links.description: We're building an artificial intelligence-powered dystopia, one click at a time, says technosociologist Zeynep Tufecki. In an eye-opening talk, she details how the same algorithms companies like Facebook, Google and Amazon use to get you to click on ads are also used to organize your access to political and social information.

messages.body: $BB No wonder they influenced the elections and got you to vote, showing what they wanted in your FB feed.... $FB $AAPL
$BB But it does not stop there, it uses that information to influence you on how you do anything based on how much they get paid. $FB $AAPL
$BB FB uses your searches, likes, comments, location, pictures and that of your friends to influence you to make simple choices $FB $AAPL
$BB Suspended by @facebook. For blowing the whistle. On something they have known privately for 2 years. https://t.co/iSu6VwqUdG $FB $AAPL

messages.body: $BB Cambridge Analytica whistleblower: 'We spent $1m harvesting millions of Facebook profiles' – video https://t.co/naNPY24pGS $FB $AAPL

links.title: Cambridge Analytica whistleblower: 'We spent $1m harvesting millions of Facebook profiles' - video
links.description: Christopher Wylie, who worked for data firm Cambridge Analytica, reveals how personal information was taken without authorisation in early 2014 to build a system that could profile individual US voters in order to target them with personalised political advertisements.

links.description: Over the last several years, the stock market was heavily influenced by the Federal Reserve, but as we've seen Trump and his administration have won the focus of market watchers.The issue from an investing standpoint is one of uncertainty.

messages.body: Apple, Microsoft Lead 5 Stocks That Have Undercut Buy Points, But Don't Give Up On Them: https://www.investors.com/news/technology/apple-microsoft-lead-5-stocks-that-have-undercut-buy-points/ $AAPL $MSFT $PYPL $SCHW $MS

links.title: Apple, Microsoft, PayPal, Schwab, Morgan Stanley Have Undercut Buy Points, But Don't Give Up On Them | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Sometimes a stock will break out, but then soon pull back below the buy point. But if it hasn't fallen too far, the buy point is still valid. That's the case with Apple ( AAPL), Microsoft ( MSFT), PayPal ( PYPL), Charles Schwab ( SCHW) and Morgan Stanley ( MS).
